thread.title: BRIEF-BHP Selects Jacobs To Deliver Engineering Services For New Nickel Sulphate Facility

title: BRIEF-BHP Selects Jacobs To Deliver Engineering Services For New Nickel Sulphate Facility

organizations.name: jacobs to deliver engineering services for new nick
jacobs to deliver engineering services for new nickel sulphate facility

text:
57 PM / Updated 4 minutes ago BRIEF-BHP Selects Jacobs To Deliver Engineering Services For New Nickel Sulphate Facility Reuters Staff 
Jan 16 (Reuters) - Jacobs Engineering Group Inc: 
* BHP SELECTS JACOBS TO DELIVER ENGINEERING SERVICES FOR NEW NICKEL SULPHATE FACILITY 
* JACOBS ENGINEERING - AWARDED ENGINEERING SERVICES CONTRACT FROM BHP FOR NEW NICKEL SULPHATE FACILITY LOCATED AT COâ€˜S KWINANA NICKEL REFINERY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
